ascend_skill.desc:
When using a different skill than the previous skill, gain 1 Chivalry stack. This can stack up to 3 times.
When an ally with less than 70% HP remaining attacks with a skill or Highlight, activate Resonance, spending 1 Chivalry stack to heal the party by 10% of Morgana's Attack + 150/225/300 (effect changes at Lv. 1/50/70, respectively).
ascend_skill.name: Morgana's Favor

ascend_skill.desc: Add the following effect to Chivalry: Restore HP of allies with less than 50% HP remaining by 30% of Morgana's Attack.
ascend_skill.name: Marvelous Pride

ascend_skill.desc: When using Healing Breeze, increase HP recovery for main target by 33%.
ascend_skill.name: Black Cat Charm

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Healing Breeze and Thief Tactics by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Grooming

ascend_skill.desc: Highlight Enhanced: When KO'd allies are revived, restore bonus HP equal to 60% of Morgana's Attack + 800.
ascend_skill.name: Aftercare

ascend_skill.desc: Increase the skill levels of Missile Whirlwind and Gentle Fist by 3.
ascend_skill.name: Airplane Ears Mode

ascend_skill.desc: Remove Gentle Fist's decreased accuracy effect. Increase target's damage taken by 15% for 2 turns.
ascend_skill.name: Look, Treasure!

highlight_skill.desc: Deal Wind damage to 1 foe equal to 227.8%/251.1%/241.8%/265.1% of Attack, and revive 1 KO'd ally with 20% HP.
highlight_skill.name: Highlight

normal_skill.desc: Deal Wind damage to 1 foe equal to 146.4%/161.4%/155.4%/170.4% of Attack. Inflict Windswept on the foe for 2 turns. Chance to gain 1 Chivalry stack (chance is equal to current critical rate).
normal_skill.name: Missile Whirlwind

normal_skill.desc: Restore party's HP by 37.6%/37.6%/39.9%/39.9% of Morgana's Attack + 1069/1300/1315/1546, and heal 1 elemental ailment. When healing an elemental ailment, gain 1 Chivalry stack.
normal_skill.name: Healing Breeze

normal_skill.desc: Decrease this skill's accuracy by 20%, increase critical rate by 30%, and deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 128.9%/142.1%/136.9%/150.1% of Attack. On a critical hit, gain 1 Chivalry stack.
normal_skill.name: Gentle Fist

passive_skill.desc:
When healing with Chivalry, increase critical rate by 30.0%.
When inflicting a critical hit, increase Chivalry's healing effect by 24.0% of Morgana's Attack + 720.
passive_skill.name: Masked Gentleman
